      • UpdateShoppingCart

        void UpdateShoppingCart(Products.Product product,
                      java.lang.String operation)
        Insert or delete a shopping cart product depending on the parameter operation. if DELETE removes the product, if INSERT inserts the product.
        Parameters:
        product -
        operation - (DELETE or INSERT)

      • UpdateUser

        void UpdateUser(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String password,
              int cardNumber,
              java.lang.String email)
        update user data from a single username. (username can't be modified.)
        Parameters:
        name - can be modified
        password - can be modified
        cardNumber - can be modified
        email - can be modified

      • CreateTransaction

        void CreateTransaction(java.lang.String transactionType)
        Create transaction from a created cart on a actual user. select type of transaction on "transactionType" String.
        Parameters:
        transactionType - can be "CREDIT_CARD", "CASH" or "PAYPAL".

      • CreateProduct

        void CreateProduct(java.lang.String name,
                 double price,
                 java.lang.String porductType)
        Create item or offer depending on the value of the string productType.
        Parameters:
        name - item or offer name
        price - item price, null if is offer.
        porductType - "ITEM" or "OFFER".

      • ReadProduct

        Products.Product ReadProduct()
        Read and Return Product data.
        Returns:
        Product

      • UpdateProduct

        void UpdateProduct(java.lang.String name,
                 double price,
                 java.lang.String offerName)
        Update item price if offerName is NULL. otherwise Insert element (name and price) in the offer list.
        Parameters:
        name - item name
        price - item price
        offerName - offer name (can be NULL)

      • DeleteProduct

        void DeleteProduct(java.lang.String name)
        Delete complete Product.
        Parameters:
        name - of product (item or offer)
